resources.string: A lot of people go to restaurants everyday, where tipping is quite a common practise. Keeping this in mind, we developed an application that makes the process easier by providing people with a lot of tipping options. \n\nThe application has the functionality to split the bill between multiple people. It is an advanced version that displays the total per person, bill per person and tip per person. Additionally, it also has the feature to save transaction details and display them in a list in the history page.

The project is aimed at solving simple day to day tip calculations of a private business or an individual. While developing the app, the following Jetpack Compose concepts were used: 

1) Viewmodel 
2) Compose Navigation 
3) Room 
4) Scrollable Lists (LazyColumn), 
5) Layouts (Row, Column, Box) 
6) Themes 
7) Buttons
